languages.text: "Многие на твоем месте ограничивались бы заботой лишь о своих колониях, особенно в столь темный и сложный час. Потому милость, которую ты проявил{mf||а} к беженцам из владений Винтерскейлов, впечатлила меня. Пустив их на Янус, ты спас{mf||ла} от гибели миллионы, когда Каллигос бросил их".

"Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."
languages.original_text: "Многие на твоем месте ограничивались бы заботой лишь о своих колониях, особенно в столь темный и сложный час. Потому милость, которую ты проявил{mf||а} к беженцам из владений Винтерскейлов, впечатлила меня. Пустив их на Янус, ты спас{mf||ла} от гибели миллионы, когда Каллигос бросил их".

And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

languages.text: "Viele in Eurer Position würden längst nicht mehr über ihre eigenen Kolonien wachen, schon gar nicht in so düsteren und schwierigen Zeiten. Umso bewundernswerter fand ich die Gnade, die ihr den Flüchtlingen aus Winterzunders Reich erwiesen habt. Indem Ihr sie auf Janus geduldet habt, habt Ihr Millionen Leben gerettet, die Calligos aufgegeben hatte."
languages.original_text: "Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

traits.locale_text: "Viele in Eurer Position würden längst nicht mehr über ihre eigenen Kolonien wachen, schon gar nicht in so düsteren und schwierigen Zeiten. Umso bewundernswerter fand ich die Gnade, die ihr den Flüchtlingen aus Winterzunders Reich erwiesen habt. Indem Ihr sie auf Janus geduldet habt, habt Ihr Millionen Leben gerettet, die Calligos aufgegeben hatte."

languages.text: « À votre place, beaucoup se seraient contentés de veiller sur leurs propres colonies, surtout en des temps aussi difficiles. La clémence dont vous avez fait preuve envers les réfugiés du royaume de Winterscale est d'autant plus admirable. En les laissant s'installer sur Janus, vous avez sauvé des millions de vies alors que Calligos les avait abandonnés à une mort certaine. »
languages.original_text: "Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, beaucoup se seraient contentés de veiller sur leurs propres colonies, surtout en des temps aussi difficiles. La clémence dont vous avez fait preuve envers les réfugiés du royaume de Winterscale est d'autant plus admirable. En les laissant s'installer sur Janus, vous avez sauvé des millions de vies alors que Calligos les avait abandonnés à une mort certaine. »

languages.text: 「あなたのような立場の者の多くは自分たちのコロニーを監視するだけで精一杯だっただろう。特に我らのような殺伐とした困難な時代に生きる者であれば。だから私は、あなたがウィンタースケールの領域からの避難民に示した慈悲を、より称賛に値するものであると感じたのだ。彼らをヤヌスに受け入れることで、カリゴスが見捨てた何百万もの命を救ったのだから…」
languages.original_text: "Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのような立場の者の多くは自分たちのコロニーを監視するだけで精一杯だっただろう。特に我らのような殺伐とした困難な時代に生きる者であれば。だから私は、あなたがウィンタースケールの領域からの避難民に示した慈悲を、より称賛に値するものであると感じたのだ。彼らをヤヌスに受け入れることで、カリゴスが見捨てた何百万もの命を救ったのだから…」

languages.text: «Muchos en su posición se habrían limitado a observar sus propias colonias, especialmente en tiempos tan aciagos y difíciles como estos. Por tanto, la piedad que mostró hacia los refugiados de los dominios de Winterscale me resultó aún más admirable. Al permitir que se establecieran en Janus, salvó los millones de vidas que Calligos había abandonado».
languages.original_text: "Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

traits.locale_text: «Muchos en su posición se habrían limitado a observar sus propias colonias, especialmente en tiempos tan aciagos y difíciles como estos. Por tanto, la piedad que mostró hacia los refugiados de los dominios de Winterscale me resultó aún más admirable. Al permitir que se establecieran en Janus, salvó los millones de vidas que Calligos había abandonado».

languages.text: “如果换做其他人身处你的位置，恐怕许多人都会放弃他们的殖民地，尤其是在这种多灾多难的时候。正因如此，我认为你对待温特斯凯尔星区难民的仁慈举动更加令人敬佩。你允许他们在加努斯定居，拯救了几百万被卡里戈斯遗弃的人民。”
languages.original_text: "Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做其他人身处你的位置，恐怕许多人都会放弃他们的殖民地，尤其是在这种多灾多难的时候。正因如此，我认为你对待温特斯凯尔星区难民的仁慈举动更加令人敬佩。你允许他们在加努斯定居，拯救了几百万被卡里戈斯遗弃的人民。”

languages.text: "Senin pozisyonunda olan biri, kolonilerini gözetmeyi bir kenara bırakırdı. Özellikle de durumu bizimki kadar iç karartıcı ve zorlu ise. Bu sebeple de Winterscale Diyarı'ndan gelen mültecilere gösterdiğin merhameti daha da takdire şayan buluyorum. Onları Janus'a kabul ederek Calligos'un terk ettiği milyonlarca yaşamı kurtarmış oldun."
languages.original_text: "Many in your position would have stopped at watching over their own colonies, especially in an hour as bleak and difficult as ours. And thus I found the mercy that you showed to the refugees from Winterscale's Realm all the more admirable. By allowing them on Janus, you saved millions of lives that Calligos had forsaken."
